name: Crash Of Club Cars - Uphill Drive Rush
name_original: Crash Of Club Cars - Uphill Drive Rush
description:
Ej yo, you just got a blue van and you need to fill it with CASH! Tap and turn, tap and turn.. it's a looong way for you, but don't dare to CRASH!

Oh and yeah, with hard earned CASH you can buy new vans.

Brrrruummm, bruum, LET'S GOOOOO!
